description: This file is a PHP source code for a web interface page that manages IPv6 firewall settings in a network gateway/router. It includes server-side PHP code, embedded JavaScript for frontend interactivity, and HTML markup for the UI components, such as radio buttons and checkboxes to configure security levels and firewall options.

methods.name: getStr
methods.description: Retrieves a string value for a given key, used for localization or retrieval of device info.

methods.name: KeyExtGet
methods.description: Fetches configuration values from device settings using specified parameters.

methods.name: setFirewall
methods.description: Sends an AJAX request to configure firewall settings on the device.
